name: CERFA-ttack
description:
You are an inspector who's mission is to control the standards of an office.
There are rumors that they stopped buying the forms they use from the official suppliers. Are they making their own bootleg forms?

It's your job to find out.

Armed with your stapler, make sure to aim for the head if they try to stop you, use as many staples as necessary, you've got thousands in your bandolier.

Shoot staples with the left mouse button when you have it drawn.

Hold SHIFT to sprint.

Default keys for movement are QZSD, you can change it in the settings, through the small box called "reglages" at the bottom left of the main menu.

Click the small red box to start playing.

There might (definitely) be bugs. Enjoy the short ride!
